about_the_game:
Embark on an epic journey in "Youra," a thrilling action-packed game that combines the nostalgia of classic beat 'em ups with a captivating elemental twist! Join Youra, Ichika, Hecate, and the charismatic Houette as they discover a mysterious Key that unlocks unimaginable powers and propels them into a battle against dark forces threatening our world.

Key Features:

🔥 Elemental Powers Unleashed: Control the forces of fire, water, earth, and air as Youra, Ichika, Hecate, and Houette harness their unique elemental abilities. Team up and strategically use your powers to overcome enemies and challenges.

🌟 Unity Stone Dynamics: Uncover the secrets of the Unity Stone, a powerful artifact that enhances your elemental powers when wielded in harmony. Form alliances, join forces, and experience the true strength of unity against the encroaching darkness.

🌍 Real Locations, Local Vibes: Immerse yourself in the game's vibrant world, featuring real Midwestern bands, local businesses, and iconic locations. Explore the heart of the Midwest as you traverse through Chicago, Greenbay, and even Puerto Rico's mystical rainforest

🎸 Rock Out in Battle: Jam to the beats of local bands as you take on waves of enemies. The game integrates music seamlessly into the action, creating a dynamic and rhythmic experience

🎨 Hand Drawn Animations: Feast your eyes on the beautifully crafted hand-drawn animations that bring the characters and environments to life. Every frame is a work of art, enhancing the immersive and visually stunning gameplay.

🕹️ Mini Games Galore: Take a break from the main quest and engage in various mini-games scattered throughout the game. From arcade challenges to quirky side quests, there's always something new to discover and conquer.

🕵️‍♂️ Easter Eggs and References: Uncover hidden secrets, Easter eggs, and references to pop culture as you progress through the game. Keep an eye out for nods to classic games, movies, and more, adding an extra layer of fun for attentive players.

Are you ready to join the fight against the forces of darkness, unlock the power of unity, and experience a nostalgic adventure filled with friendship, music, and elemental chaos? Get ready for "Youra" – where the beatdowns are as epic as the soundtrack!

name: Youra The Game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7/8/10 (32 or 64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core 2GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compliant graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Common

dejus.descriptors:
Linguagem imprópria
Drogas ilícitas
Violência fantasiosa

short_description: "Youra" unfolds as a captivating tale of destiny, elemental powers, and the eternal struggle between light and darkness. When Youra and Ichika discover a mysterious key, their lives take an unexpected turn as dark forces descend upon them.
